title: League servers are CRAP
body: League Servers have been crap lately most of my games i stand still trying to reconnect and get killed i know it is the servers because i can watch youtube perfectly fine i just got a timer because league decided to have a black screen as soon as i got into champion select and it was saying trying to reconnect so i watched youtube as it was perfectly loading im getting really mad and about to quit league.

replies.body:
Yup, the servers indeed are crap. Thousands of people have reported issue with lag spikes over the past week, and not a single valid red post has been made about it, other than the typical problems.

16 years in IT, and I can guarantee that there is something very wrong with LOL servers.

Just had my ping hit 1000+ several times in a row this last game, netanlyzr says nothing about my connection except that the typical ports that should be blocked, are blocked.  

Tracert is fine.  Ping is fine.  Ports open.  blah blah blah 100% on Riot's end.
Yea I'm getting the same issue, can't even log back in.  It's weird as not everyone is getting this.
i have had ping spikes alot maxing 12 000 on several occasions
They are fine to me and my friends, and the hundreds are people I've played with and against this week. Prob your computer.

Well thank you for commenting but not my the problem isn't the computer it deals with internet and the internet that the riot servers are sending were just not good enough to support the gameplay. As I stated it was the servers because youtube could play perfectly fine with no buffers. Again thank you for reading and commenting.
